title: Signets & Powers
description: Test your knowledge of rider abilities!

questions.question: What is a signet?

options.text: A magical ability gained from bonding a dragon

questions.explanation: A signet is a unique magical power that manifests in a rider after bonding with their dragon.

questions.question: What is Violet's signet?
questions.explanation: Violet can wield lightning, a powerful and rare signet that makes her formidable in battle.

questions.question: What is Xaden's signet?
questions.explanation: Xaden can control shadows, using them to hide, attack, and even communicate secretly.

questions.question: Every rider who bonds a dragon develops a signet.
questions.explanation: All bonded riders eventually manifest a signet, though it may take time to appear and master.

questions.question: What is Dain's signet ability?
questions.explanation: Dain can read people's recent memories by touching them, which creates trust issues.

questions.question: What determines what signet a rider gets?

options.text: Their dragon and their own nature

questions.explanation: A rider's signet is influenced by both their dragon's power and their own personality and needs.

questions.question: Using signets too much can kill a rider.
questions.explanation: Overusing one's signet can drain a rider completely and potentially kill them from exhaustion.

questions.question: What unique ability does Andarna potentially give Violet?
questions.explanation: Being bonded to two dragons means Violet may develop two signets, which is extremely rare.
